values.description: or 0x8; Capitalized words are not checked
or 0x10; Words containing a web address are not checked
or 0x2; Words that are mixed-case (upper case and lowercase, e.g., eDrawings) are not checked
or 0x1; Words that are all uppercase are not checked
or 0x4; Words containing both letters and numbers are not checked

or 0x20; Do not stop Microsoft Word, which is the spell-check engine, after checking the first and any subsequent annotations if you have a significant number of annotations to spell check; however, on the last use of IAnnotation::CheckSpelling , you must disable this flag so that Microsoft Word is shut down after that call
